title: Partial success
description:
It mostly worked…
+1 Effect,
or success with a Complication

title: Fumble
description:
It failed!
Bonuses to Effect does not apply.
──
Immediately announce,
if you have 3+ Fumbles or only Fumbles in your hand ➜ Catastrophe

title: Chaos
description:
Something unexpected happened.
──
Cannot be used for defense
